title: PCK Enhancement Project-Based Workshop for Pre-Service Physics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics knowledge and fundamental grasp of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Concept map-based lesson design and practical training environment utilizing the CoMCoRe-LS model

learning_goals: Establish systematic instructional plans connecting physics curriculum content and teaching methods using Concept Maps (CoMCoRe)
Improve lesson study (LS) designs through peer feedback and enhance situational application abilities of Pedagogical Content Knowledge (PCK)
Evaluate the integration of theoretical knowledge and practical skills through real classroom simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
